about_the_game:
If an anomaly occurs, return to the opposite elevator!
Find the pattern from the repeating station platform and escape!
A mysterious respect-based escape game from the wondrous dark ground station to the exit, "3番線 | Sanbansen"

The sequel to the popular game '2番線 | Nibansen', which has sold 15,000 copies worldwide! I think you will enjoy playing from "3番線 | Sanbansen."

This train includes slight horror elements. Please give up your seat for all passengers, including the elderly, those with a fear disability, and those who are pregnant or with infants.
Soon, we will arrive at Sanbansen. Change here for anomaly, escape, puzzle, and slight horror elements. Exit 10 is straight ahead.
Please be careful of the gap between the world and the platform.

【Game Description】
Escape from the infinitely repeating Sanbansen!
Created with the unique freedom of student ideas, enjoy the anomalies!

Do not miss any anomalies.

If you find an anomaly, turn back immediately and head for the opposite exit.

If no anomalies are found, just keep going.

Exit through exit 10.

"2番線 | Nibansen" and "3番線 | Sanbansen" are inspired by the stations of a major Japanese city's circular railway and places like exit 8, short walking simulator games.
【Playtime】
15 to 240 minutes

【Streaming Guidelines】

Streaming is allowed without permission for both individuals and corporations.
Monetization is only allowed using the features provided by the streaming site.
Please do not use titles like "The sequel to Exit 8!?" or "XX version of Exit 8" in thumbnails, titles, videos, or descriptions.
Using terms like "Exit 8 style" or "Exit 8 like" is permitted in thumbnails, titles, videos, and descriptions.
Mentioning it as a sequel to "2番線 | Nibansen" is not a problem.
Using the promotional video in your videos or streams is allowed.
Including the game's name in the title of your video/stream and a link to the Steam page in the description is appreciated and will bring joy.
We are not responsible for any damages incurred by streaming this game.
The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

【Settings】
A restart from the settings menu is possible, as well as adjustments for window settings, mouse sensitivity, and volume. It is recommended for streamers to restart the game after launching before starting to record.

【Controls】

Right-click to zoom.
Shift + W to dash.

[Controller Operation Instructions]

Move: L Stick
Viewpoint: R Stick
Zoom: R Trigger
Dash: L Stick + L Trigger

[If you play with a controller, please follow these steps]
1. Open the Steam library
2. Right-click on Sanbansen
3. Open Properties
4. Open Controller
5. Change the override for Sanbansen to "Disable Steam Input"

【Post-Clear Content】
After clearing, you can turn off "No Anomalies" in the settings. Use it to search for anomalies.
【Camera Shake】
To prevent motion sickness, the camera is set not to shake. Turning on the reticle in the settings may reduce the likelihood of motion sickness.

【Difficulty】

Nibansen ★★★★☆
Sanbansen ★★★★★
Compared to nibansen , the map is narrower, making it easier to find anomalies as they become more concentrated. However, the goal is more challenging, as the exits range from the 7th exit like C1→C7 in Nibansen , to 10 exits from Exit 1 to Exit 10 in Sanbansen.

【A Note】
We worked hard to create a mysterious and fun game experience with three students. Please enjoy it.

  • Storage: 5 GB available space
